title: Ep. 223 - The One Thing Saving Us From Civil War
description:
With all of these deep ideological divides in our country, are we on the verge of civil war? I think there is only one thing preventing it. Also, how old is too old to be president? Should there be an age limit? And what does it mean to say that the Bible is divinely inspired? We'll tackle all of these questions today. Date: 03-22-2019
